name: Damage reduction - When is it good?
author: EasternPromises

posts.author: EasternPromises
posts.content:
Against Flame arrow and IGMS.

But really, what are your guys' takes on DR? Would you ever just take the 9/- from feats alone? Is there a minimum you would ever invest it for certain magic levels?

posts.author: Valkos
posts.content:
it depends on the server a lot. low magic servers they are really strong. you dont need a ton of ab generally and extra hp + dr makes a tank.
i would though always combine it with dwd or barbarian. Otherwise it feels wrong. barb gets mighty rage as well, so it is a double stat requirement for that class.
Also useable on medium magic servers that offer some physical immunities and/or regen.

my 50 cents

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Aye, it works wonders in low-medium PW's, especially Vs certain enemies & (humanoid) bosses.
Like Valkos, I tend to take it with Barbarians too, having a total of 17 DR by forty level.

posts.author: Valkos
posts.content:
Barbarians are kings of low magic servers when it comes to overall tankiness and dmg due to rage, TerryRage, EDR III and just the HP from barbarian is just a very strong character. It does everything better than most, but is not a stand out offensive or defensive character like a WM, a warrior cleric, a full fledged DWD.

What it compares mostly too, is actually a non-dwarf dwarven defender with a bit more umph!

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
And a bit more anger-management issues as well...
😡
